q: The singer, who assists Simon Cowell on The X Factor, tweeted last night:`` Coming out now.'' Sinitta then received messages from her followers to congratulate her on the admission. One wrote: Welcome to the pink side! We have cupcakes! However, the star later revealed that the tweet was instead intended to be a text message for her personal chauffeur, Gemel.
